system.effect: A blast of energy envelops the target's head, burning his face and hair, crisping his skin, and causing him to scream like a stuck grox. In addition to losing all hair on his scalp and face, he is Blinded for [[1d10]] rounds and Stunned for 1 round. Permanently reduce the target's Fellowship characteristic by 1.

description.value:
Energy Damage to Head (Severity 5)

A blast of energy envelops the target's head, burning his face and hair, crisping his skin, and causing him to scream like a stuck grox. In addition to losing all hair on his scalp and face, he is Blinded for [[1d10]] rounds and Stunned for 1 round. Permanently reduce the target's Fellowship characteristic by 1.
